Detailed Description

An interface for the observer pattern used by Twitter to notify listeners of Twitter updates.

This is mainly used by FeedPanel to receive its updates

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual TwitterUpdateListener::~TwitterUpdateListener (  )  [inline, virtual]

Member Function Documentation

virtual void TwitterUpdateListener::TwitterUpdateReceived ( const Twitter &  twitter,
const wxString &  resource 
) [pure virtual]

Implement this method to handle an update notification from Twitter on the string resource identifier.

Parameters:
twitter the twitter object which initiated the notification
resource the resource name representing the feed that was updated. Use Twitter::GetFeed to retrieve the feed associated with the resource.

Implemented in FeedPanel.
